examples: They had to stop short to avoid hitting the dog in the street.
He cut me short repeatedly in the meeting.
The boss got a message and cut the meeting short .
The recent developments at work caught them short .

definitions.definition: Without achieving a goal or requirement .
examples: His speech fell short of what was expected.

definitions.definition: Relatively far from the batsman and hence bouncing higher than normal; opposite of full .
labels: of the manner of bounce of a cricket ball
definitions.label_groups: cricket , of the manner of bounce of a cricket ball

examples: We went short most finance companies in July.

secondary_definitions: Without achieving a goal or requirement .
( cricket , of the manner of bounce of a cricket ball ) Relatively far from the batsman and hence bouncing higher than normal; opposite of full .
( finance ) With a negative ownership position.
